name: Spiritual Cleansing Protocols
description: Deep-cleansing techniques to detoxify the body, mind, and spirit from lingering energetic attachments.

cards.title: The Salt and Smoke Purge
cards.description: Using salt and sacred smoke to purify spaces, objects, and personal energy fields.
cards.bulletpoints: Salt Barrier Creation, Smudging Techniques, Air Elemental Purification

cards.title: Spiritual Bathing Rituals
cards.description: Harnessing water and minerals to cleanse energetic toxins from the body.
cards.bulletpoints: Herbal Infusions, Moon and Sun Water Charging, Frequency-Based Water Cleansing

cards.title: Full Moon and Solar Purification
cards.description: Using lunar and solar energies to recharge and purify the energetic body.
cards.bulletpoints: Moonlight Absorption, Solar Vitalization, Chakra Rebalancing with Celestial Energies
